channel.title: Services on Blind3y3Design
channel.description: Recent content in Services on Blind3y3Design

item.title: Design Systems
item.description: I provide design, development, leadership, and guidance to build, improve, extend or maintain a design system from inception.

item.title: UX and Accessibility
item.description: I design programs to test the usability and clarity of designs. I also audit for accessibility, beyond simple compliance.

item.title: Front-End Development
item.description: No matter the size or scale, I can work with you or your team to build a standards compliant web product.
